title: GG RITO. Kat, builds cloth armor, destroys tank top lane.
body:
GG RITO. AP assassin that can start cloth/5 and absolutely wreck a garen top lane. Quality balance team.

Clear a wave like it's nothing, absolutely wrecks Garen like it's nothing. With cloth armor. Whatever you say RITO.

replies.body: If you are getting wrecked by Kat as Garen then you are doing something seriously wrong.
If you lost lane to Katarina as Garen, a hard counter to her, an AP Assassin's worst nightmare, then you are just suffering from lack of skill.

> [{quoted}](name=dirtikiti,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=La19dJEP,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-15T20:26:20.772+0000)
>
> GG RITO. AP assassin that can start cloth/5 and absolutely wreck a garen top lane. Quality balance team.
> 
> Clear a wave like it's nothing, absolutely wrecks Garen like it's nothing. With cloth armor. Whatever you say RITO.

I notice you're downvoting everyone, so let's do some advice.

You need to bully a Kat as Garen.  You cannot allow her to free Q you to shut down your passive. 
Levels 1-3 you shoudl absolutely rofl stomp her so she cannot be relevant until she hits 6, at which point, you destroy her.  
If he has the stones to shunpo onto you, Q her Ult the moment she spins up and then spin on her face, then Ult her.  GG

> [{quoted}](name=TeemoJenkins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=La19dJEP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-15T20:39:12.838+0000)
>
> I notice you're downvoting everyone, so let's do some advice.
> 
> You need to bully a Kat as Garen.  You cannot allow her to free Q you to shut down your passive. 
> Levels 1-3 you shoudl absolutely rofl stomp her so she cannot be relevant until she hits 6, at which point, you destroy her.  
> If he has the stones to shunpo onto you, Q her Ult the moment she spins up and then spin on her face, then Ult her.  GG

I'm not downvoting anyone.... I just checked this thread right now...

Kat apparently can silence Garen, clear waves through his E, and destroy him while the entire wave of minions she then sits in attacks him.

I understand that I should destroy her... I couldn't do a damn thing to her AT ALL. She ate all my attacks, cleared minion waves faster than a wukong with tiamat...

Here's some friendly advice. Use a replay service to record your matches. Then you can rewatch them and see where you went wrong. You can even show them to others to help you point out mistakes. It's a good way to get better.

Katarina has no possible way of silencing anyone, so you're definitely misremembering the events.
I'm misremembering being silenced, in lane, pre-6 by a champ I absolutely KNOW does NOT have a silence? That's odd, because I couldn't use any abilities and had the silence icon over my head.
Kat can and will wear down a tank through repeated poking that isn't met with counter-attacks. If she beat a Garen, that Garen didn't trade back well.

Whatever you say. I guess Q'ing her anytime she was anywhere near me, then popping up my spin wasn't good enough... she STILL cleared an ENTIRE WAVE of minions, STANDING IN MY SPIN, PRE LEVEL 6, like it was nothing.

She even managed to silence me somehow, multiple times. I don't remember her having a silence in her kit.
Did you check her masteries and runes? She may have been running a heavy defensive loadout. Flat armor runes and defensive masteries can do a lot for lane phase durability.

No shit? 

You act like I've never played Garen before, ever. It did absolutely nothing to her, and apparently, she gained a silence, too, because nearly every time she initiated, I'd be silenced.

> [{quoted}](name=dirtikiti,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=La19dJEP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-15T20:46:27.295+0000)
>
> No shit? 
> 
> You act like I've never played Garen before, ever. It did absolutely nothing to her, and apparently, she gained a silence, too, because nearly every time she initiated, I'd be silenced.

and with that you lost any form of credibility. In short this shows you know nothing of the match up and clearly need to improve your skills. This isn't on katarina it is on garen.
Whatever you say. You insult my intelligence and claim I lose credibility. Funny story.

> [{quoted}](name=dirtikiti,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=La19dJEP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-15T20:46:27.295+0000)
>
> No shit? 
> 
> You act like I've never played Garen before, ever. It did absolutely nothing to her, and apparently, she gained a silence, too, because nearly every time she initiated, I'd be silenced.

Katarina doesn't have a silence in her kit.

Kat is a free lane for Garen. You played badly.
It appears you used a different account to play against Kat, could you link that match so we can offer build advice?

MR vs her Cloth 5

Tank Runes/Masteries.

Try it. Kat destroys you. You bully her, she clears the minions wave (somehow... literally next to impossible pre-6, especially without an AP item) while standing in your E, you get fucked.

garen can get poked by kat, then he all in-s with silence and spin, doing 50% of her health while healing about the same damage he takes from minions, especially if he uses a potion


I've beaten a kat top as gangplank...that person swapped lanes with Ekko because I could out poke her and got fed early


kat top is a horrible idea...I think the only champs she can kill there are teemo, vlad, quinn, jinx, and kalista (both of whom are rare picks) unless your opponents don't know what they're doing and you REALLY DO

chogath top will eat kat alive(literally), gnar can outpoke, outtank and outdamage kat

darius will absolutely 100-0 her



kat is not a top lane champ...

For those who have not noticed this is a purposefully made troll.

2/10 for the originality of swapping Garen and Kat's names.

8/10 because you actually hooked a few with it.


:)
